_comment: WaybackProxy Configuration - Copy to config.json and customize
_DATE_comment: Target date for Wayback Machine (YYYYMMDD, YYYYMM, or YYYY). Default: Windows XP release date
_DATE_TOLERANCE_comment: Allow loading content up to X days after DATE. Set to null for unlimited
_QUICK_IMAGES_comment: Use original Wayback URLs for faster image loading
_WAYBACK_API_comment: Use Wayback Availability API for closest snapshots (slower but more reliable)
_CONTENT_TYPE_ENCODING_comment: Allow encoding in Content-Type header (disable for very old browsers like Mosaic)

HARDWARE._gpio_clk_comment: GPIO pin for rotary encoder CLK (BCM numbering)
HARDWARE._gpio_dt_comment: GPIO pin for rotary encoder DT (BCM numbering)
HARDWARE._gpio_button_comment: GPIO pin for push button (BCM numbering)
